'''Hence, Call Them My Own Verses''' is [[Xingqiu]]'s [[Level 6 Constellation]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* Before unlocking this constellation, during the duration of [[Guhua Sword: Raincutter]], the number of swords per attack consistently alternates between 2 swords and 3 swords. After unlocking this constellation, the order is 2 Swords → 3 Swords → 5 Swords.
